name: Moolah match
description:
Use your skills to collect the sugar sweets ingredients and finish all tricky tasks on every level all the way to the top. Are you prepared of an amazing adventure?

Dozens of tricky and amazing levels awaits you in the Moolah match game of joy!
Yse the chefs ingredients in order to unlock, boost and blast your way ahead to the finish line!

Match the candy and sweets according to the tasks on each level,
Explore a wonderful and crisp game where candy smashing meets excitements and tons of fun gaming that will bring you tons of fun gaming all day long.

Suitable for all ages to play.
Try it, you will probaly love the game!
